name.ja: <ruby>ＴＧ<rt>テックジーナス</rt></ruby> — オールクリア

text.en: "T.G." monsters on the field become Machine monsters. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "T.G." monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) During your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 "T.G." monster you control or in your hand, and if you do, add 1 "T.G." monster with a different name from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "T.G. - All Clear" once per turn.
